Florida Court Asked To Protect Confidentiality Of Limbaugh's Medical Records 
 
 In a friend-of-the-court motion, the ACLU of Florida says state law enforcement officers violated Rush Limbaugh's privacy rights by seizing the conservative radio talk show host's medical records as part of a criminal investigation involving alleged "doctor shopping.
